body_html:
@gunan I am seeing a similar issue loading saved checkpoints (saved using tensorflow.contrib.session_bundl.exporter) with session_bundle.load_session_bundle_from_path. This used to work. What should I change so that I can save and then load a given model?

The files that saved_model seems to be looking for:

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/saved_model/loader.py

Lines 91 to 97 in 2771110

path_to_pbtxt = os.path.join(
compat.as_bytes(export_dir),
compat.as_bytes(constants.SAVED_MODEL_FILENAME_PBTXT))
# Build the path to the SavedModel in pb format.
path_to_pb = os.path.join(
compat.as_bytes(export_dir),
compat.as_bytes(constants.SAVED_MODEL_FILENAME_PB))
are different from what I see created by the checkpointer.

 are different from what I see created by the checkpointer.
body:
@gunan I am seeing a similar issue loading saved checkpoints (saved using `tensorflow.contrib.session_bundl.exporter`) with `session_bundle.load_session_bundle_from_path`. This used to work. What should I change so that I can save and then load a given model?

The files that saved_model seems to be looking for: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/27711108b5fce2e1692f9440631a183b3808fa01/tensorflow/python/saved_model/loader.py#L91-L97 are different from what I see created by the checkpointer.
